articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: US army ads featuring Jonathan Majors pulled after arrest - The Guardian
articles.description: The Creed III actor’s ads were a key element in the army’s drive to revive struggling recruitment numbers
articles.content:
Ads for the US army featuring Jonathan Majors have been pulled after the actors arrest.
Majors, who authorities said was arrested on Saturday in New York on charges of assault and harassment, was th… [+1371 chars]
